data.title: Great informal meeting place
data.text: Convenient location, great wines, fantastic cigars and very good service.  Great atmosphere and a mixed, interesting crowd.  Loved it.

data.title: Wonderful Ambiance
data.text: Came here with coworkers after dinner.  Being across from Bass Hall was beautiful, music from Sundance Square lending to the enjoyable patio, cool breezes and good cigars.  Try their old fashioned!  If you do not, you will be sorely disappointed.  They are THAT good!

data.title: Wonderful Cigar Lounge
data.text: This place is definitely my favorite that I have ever visited. If you love a good cigar this is the place to be in Fort Worth. A very laid back atmosphere for all types people in suits to casual t-shirt and shorts and all having a great time. Cigar prices are average cost as in cigar shops and drink prices seem average for the DFW area. There was live music and it was good. We had a wonderful time and didn't want to leave but did enjoy our time there a memorable time not to be forgotten. Thanks Silver Leaf when back in this area we will be back.

data.title: Our new favorite cigar lounge!
data.text:
My fiancée and I were asking about where to buy a cigar in downtown Fort Worth and they told us about this place... Wow what a find! We ended up going back again the next day we liked it so much... They keep the drinks flowing and will bring you whatever cigar you want or you can go pick your own out in their large walk-in humidor. 
We sat outside at one of the 4 tables they had out there and enjoyed people watching for a couple of hours as the chairs were comfortable and the staff right there when you needed something... They remembered us, what we drank and type of cigar when we went back the next day. Definitely check it out!

data.title: THE Cigar Bar in Fort Worth
data.text: I have been here in multiple occasions and have not been disappointed yet.  Excellent selection of cigars and whiskey plus other drinks.  I normally go in busy nights and service is the same as any other bar on a busy night.  When I want to go out on the town and smoke a stogie, this is it!!

data.title: A great evening retreat
data.text: Wow this place is top notch. When you walk you can smell the fun, the aroma is very inviting. I'm not sure if it's BYOC or not, did not mater the prices for a great stick were just as good as any place. I had a Liga Privda #9 for $14.99 which is a good price, and during that time it was happy hour. The drinks were even better priced.once you pick out a stick the cigar girls will cut, and toast it for you. Then you set back an enjoy the conversation and the great drinks.

data.title: Want a cigar and killer cocktail at a downtown bar?  You just found one.......
data.text:
Talk about a very nice relaxing place for a stogie and a designer drink of your choosing... I  love this place.  
I met a bartender there named Mark.  He was a great bartender.  Reminded me of the good ole days!  Smart, funny and one heck of a bartender.  A breath of fresh air.
Get down to this place immediately and start enjoying your downtown Fort Worth life.

data.title: Great spot in downtown!
data.text: We stumbled upon this place after having dinner at Del Frisco's.  My husband wanted to buy an after dinner cigar, and this spot came up within walking distance on Yelp.  Yelp never fails us...we had a blast!  They have TVs everywhere, live music, a full bar AND a full humidor!  The bartenders and managers were great, as were the drinks.  Prices, WELL, they were a little much, especially for the cigars.  If you are looking for a cheap cigar this is NOT the place, but when in Rome right?  I had a Madagascar vanilla as well as a "thin mint" cigar (as in the GS cookie)...holy crap that was tasty!  My husband had a good cigar as well, but the prices were really bugging him, so he stuck to one.  He's kind of a cigar snob, but I digress.  He also had an after dinner scotch, which improved his mood a bit.  I won't lie, it is smokey in there, but once you get used to it you'll be fine.  We are really happy we found this place and we'll be back for sure!

data.title: If you enjoy smoking Cigars, you will love this place.
data.text: I stopped in this place after purchasing Cigars from another Cigar lounge ( Will not mention them) They had happy hours, drinks well priced, Awesome Humidor, great management. I was even given permission to smoke someone else Cigar in there. Not many places would ever make that offer. Kudos to this place.

data.title: Very Nice-Great Environment
data.text: Very nice place for a relaxing evening.  The humidor is small but the selection is very good.  The service was excellent and very friendly.

data.title: Great place to whine down for a drink and a smoke.
data.text: I was told of this place from friends of mines and wanted to give it a try. Bought several cigars. The price was not too bad. Next time I go will defenetly

data.title: Pure Relaxation
data.text:
The Silver Leaf is one of my favorite places to go after work and wind down.  The walk in humidor has a wonderful selection of cigars to choose from and the drink menu is fantastic.  
The ventilation system is wonderful, therefore feeling smoked out in a stuffy room is not an issue here.  The air stays surprisingly breathable.
The place has many table to choose from, but my favorite are the over sized comfy chairs near the gas fireplace.  You can also order food from one of the nearby restaurants and the staff will retrieve it for you.
The lounge is very female friendly with  classy clientele.

The waitresses cater to your needs and cut your cigar by your preference and light it for you.  The outside patio is also a wonderful place to sit on a  cool evening.

Use the valet parking.  Its free if you have them validate your ticket and with a bush of a text message button, your car is delivered right to you.  

Relaxation.  Convenience.  A good smoke.

data.title: We had an enjoyable evening.
data.text: My wife and I visited for the first time. I was concerned about a dress code (both of us were wearing shorts with collard shirt/blouse) but I was assured we would be fine after a pre-arrival phone call. We were welcomed by the staff to open seating. Asked for a drink menu and was provided with a cigar menu and drink menu. Walk-in humidor was open for shopping or you could pick from the menu. Manager was in the humidor and assisted me in a selection for me and my wife. Beverage choices were abundant with custom cocktails, wine, scotch, whiskey and bottled and craft draft beer. Ventilation system worked great with 15+ patrons by keeping smoke levels to a minimum. Our lounge waitress was dressed conservatively and had a sweet demeanor. My wife and I (36 years old) had a great evening in the lounge and hope to return soon.

data.title: Great lounge
data.text: Cigars an fine drink. This place has it not to mention a place to enjoy it all. They know service and have nice seating. Use the valet parking for a casual night in town.

data.title: Best Cigar lounge I have ever been to
data.text: Great drunk selection, especially if you enjoy the whiskey family. A very good humidor with a wide price and style variety. Very female friendly with music choices and friendly staff to educate or assist.

data.title: nice ambiance, decent wine, slow service
data.text:
I have been to Silver Leaf Cigar Lounge twice now, both times we sat on the outside patio. 

Our first visit to Silver Leaf was a Saturday night, and the server was incredibly attentive.  One of my friends was served a glass of wine that had gone bad (tasted like vinegar), but within minutes of bringing it to our server's attention, she had a fresh glass of wine.  We had a wonderful time and really enjoyed the atmosphere!

Based on our previous experience, my husband and I recommended SIlver Leaf for a group of our friends this past Sunday evening.  Since we were on the patio,  we had to walk in twice just to request menus.  Once we received our menus, our table noticed that the bottles of wine were an incredible value.  It seemed too good to be true, but our waitress confirmed the pricing, and we decided to split a few  bottles among our group.  It took 20 minutes for our waitress to take our order and another 10 minutes for her to come back outside and tell us she had given us Wednesday menus (when they offer half price bottles), and these bottles were actually twice as much.  Why have separate menus for Wednesday when you can just tell your customers bottles are half price?  Also, why were these menus available to be distributed on a Sunday?  We placed different orders.  It took 15 minutes for us to received our glass of wine, and another 15 minutes for two of the men at our table to be told they were out of the beer they requested.  By this time we'd been there  an hour and half of our group still didn't have drinks.  While many of us would have most likely ordered a second round, our waitress came outside a handful of times to serve the other two tables on the patio but never checked in with us to see if we wanted to order more.  One of our guests did go inside and order directly from the bar to expedite his drink service.  i'm not sure we will be back  (there are too many other wonderful patio bars with quicker service in the downtown area), but I recommend sitting inside so that you can just order directly from the bar!

data.title: Awesome Place!!!!
data.text: I've been in Cigar lounges around the world and this place may be the best. Excellent selection of cigars, great music, super staff. Smoke ventilation system was unbelievable. Great place for couples.

data.title: Excellent new cigar bar!
data.text: My husband and I were just walking around beautiful downtown Fort Worth and I happened to see this place. A very clean and well stocked cigar lounge! They have a ventilation system that works wonders on not leaving your clothes smelling like smoke (which if the cigar is quality, your cigar smoke shouldn't stay on your clothes for too long). The staff was extremely helpful, friendly, and I can't wait to go back! Especially Molly (very attentive with excellent suggestions)! My husband is a big cigar smoker and he loved their selection and reasonable prices! If you are in Fort Worth, this is THE place to be!!
